item.description: Individual traders don't know what to do right now.

item.title: Marvell Technology's post-earnings sell-off is a buying opportunity, Loop Capital says in upgrade
item.description: The disappointed response — Marvell shares are down 16% in the premarket — is one investors should take advantage of, the firm said.

item.title: Wells Fargo downgrades MongoDB after earnings, says stock is rangebound from here
item.description: MongoDB issued weaker-than-expected full year guidance because of slow growth in its Atlas cloud-based database service.
